# SingleStoreConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo property

If true, preserves security-sensitive information in the connection string retrieved from any open [`SingleStoreConnection`](../SingleStoreConnection.md).

```csharp
public bool PersistSecurityInfo { get; set; }
```
